title: DNC Convention First Night, Steve Cortes
itunes:title: DNC Convention First Night, Steve Cortes
description:
Guests: Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg Politics Editor, Nikki Fried, Florida's Commissioner of Agriculture and Consumer Services, Steve Cortes, Trump 2020 Senior Advisor of Strategy, Jim Kessler, Senior VP for Policy and Cofounder of Thirdway, and former Policy Director for Senator Chuck Schumer, and Colin Reed, GOP Strategist & Managing Director at the Levinson Group.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
